scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc && rm -rf dist/tests* && find ./dist -name "*.js.map" -type f -delete && cp -r dist/lib/* dist/. && rm -rf dist/lib
scripts.lint: tslint -c tslint.json lib/**/*.ts && tslint -c tests/tslint.json tests/**/*.ts
scripts.test:cov: istanbul cover -x "dist/lib/express.js" --dir ./dist/coverage ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- dist/tests/**/*.js --report lcovonly -R spec --bail -- && npm run test:remap && cat ./dist/coverage/coverage | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
